name: Music_4100.wav
keywords: ['epic rock', 'punchy snare', 'punchy hollow kick', 'whispering male vocal', 'electric guitar chords', 'energetic cymbals', 'arpeggiated synth melody', 'arpeggiated filtered melody', 'energetic', 'arpeggiated violin melody']
caption: The Epic Rock song features a punchy snare, punchy hollow kick hits, wide electric guitar chords, simple bass guitar, energetic cymbals, arpeggiated filtered melody, arpeggiated violin and arpeggiated synth melody over which there is a whispering male vocal at one point. It sounds like something you would hear at the end of an action movie, while credits are rolling.
